title: Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, Portable Speaker with Microphone, Wireless Waterproof Speaker for Travel, Outdoor and Pool Use, Black
descriptions:
Meet the Bose SoundLink Flex — the portable Bluetooth speaker that turns every moment into a soundtrack. Rugged yet refined, this sleek black speaker packs deep, clear, immersive audio powered by a custom-engineered transducer and Bose PositionIQ technology, so your music sounds full and balanced whether it’s upright, hanging from your pack, or floating beside you in the pool.

Built for real life, SoundLink Flex is IP67 waterproof, dustproof, and drop tested. It even floats, resists corrosion and UV light, and shrugs off sand, sun, and splashes. Take it anywhere with its compact design and handy utility loop that secures to bags, bikes, or paddle boards.

Play all day with up to 12 hours of battery life, then recharge via USB-C in about 4 hours. Stay connected within 30 feet over Bluetooth, take crystal-clear calls with the built-in microphone, and go hands-free with Siri or Google Assistant. Personalize settings, pair with other Bose speakers, and get updates through the Bose Connect app.

Why you’ll love it:
- Big Bose sound in a travel-ready size
- Truly tough: waterproof (IP67), dust resistant, shock resistant, UV and corrosion resistant, and it floats
- Smart orientation sensing for consistently great audio anywhere
- Up to 12 hours per charge, USB-C convenience
- Built-in mic for calls and voice assistants
- Secure, go-anywhere utility loop and compact design

From beach days to mountain trails to poolside nights, the Bose SoundLink Flex keeps the music going — effortlessly, beautifully, and everywhere you want it.
